# scaleType

**Instance Property**

The scale for the axis.

## Declaration

```swift
var scaleType: AXNumericDataAxisDescriptor.ScaleType { get set }
```

## Discussion

Match the value of this property to the visual representation in the chart.

The default value is [doc://com.apple.Accessibility/documentation/Accessibility/AXNumericDataAxisDescriptor/ScaleType-swift.enum/linear].

## Configuring the axis scale

- **AXNumericDataAxisDescriptor.ScaleType**: Constants that describe the scale of a numeric axis.
